"T:Unleashed Prestige":
"A huge Phantom has been detected off the
coast of Japan on planet Earth. It has
already begun its approach towards the
nearby urban area. If it isn't dealt with,
we predict that the damage will be colossal.
All ARKS, intercept and destroy the target
to put an end to the Phantom invasion!
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Time limit expires"

"We're commencing the operation to
intercept the super-massive energy
reading detected in the Pacific Ocean."

"First, we have to stop it from
moving. We'll use an A.I.S. sortie
to hit it with a cryogenic warhead
that'll freeze it in its tracks."

"Once it's frozen, begin your
assault and head towards the
target. Considering how heavily
armed it is, we can expect it to
shoot back. Please be careful."

"You must destroy the target before
it can reach urban areas on shore."

"Deploy the A.I.S. and use its
new Hi-Boost ability to quickly
reach and destroy the target!"
